item.title: HOWTO: Fix no mobile internet after Cyanogenmod install
item.description: Here’s a simple fix to problems of no Mobile Internet after installing Cyanogenmod rom on your Android. If you’re new to rooting your Android or just forgotten how complicated it can be to get online with your mobile phone – you might think this is a really useful tip. Check your APN Settings After you root your phone and install CyanogenMod you can find your have no wifi and no wireless internet connection.
